Appliances Estimated Usage (hr) Estimated Cost (RM) Grand Total ADVICE OK This calculator will help you calculate the estimated cost of each appliances by month / day / year.\n\nThe calculation is done based on the added appliances.\n\nYou can add, edit and delete appliances in “View Appliances”. Advice
Set the AC temperature around 24 can save electricity.
Let the clothes run longer on low heat when using a clothes dryer.
Only boil the water you actually need when using a kettle.
Turning down the hair dryer heat can reduce the electric consumption.
Cover the food with a lid or wrap to shorten the heating time.
Cook several dishes at once when using a oven.
Avoid opening the fridge door frequently.
Letting the washing machine wash with cold water can save 80% of energy.
Turning down the water heater heat can reduce the electric consumption.
Remember to unplug or turn off the appliances that are not in used.
LED bulbs cost less energy.
Installing solar panel can save a lot of energy.
Replace old appliances with energy-saving models.
Reduce your reliance on appliances.
Are you sure you wanna exit? Exit DashboadViewModel
